abstract: A group of former high-ranking Citigroup executives defended the firm’s management of risk in its credit derivatives business, telling an investigative panel that the firm’s multibillion-dollar subprime mortgage losses arose from events beyond their control.

lead_paragraph: A group of former high-ranking Citigroup executives defended the firm’s management of risk in its credit derivatives business on Wednesday, telling an investigative panel that the firm’s multibillion-dollar subprime mortgage losses arose from unprecedented global events beyond their control.

headline.main: Ex-Citi Executives Take Fire at Crisis Hearing
